greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A111595 (normalized rescaled squared Hermite polynomials).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..449
mathematica: With[{nmax = 50}, CoefficientList[Series[Exp[x/(1 + x)]/Sqrt[1 - x^2], {x, 0, nmax}], x]*Range[0, nmax]!] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 10 2018 *)
program: from sympy import hermite, Poly, sqrt
def a(n): return sum(Poly(1/2**n*hermite(n, sqrt(x/2))**2, x).all_coeffs()) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 26 2017
(MAGMA) m:=30; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m); b:=Coefficients(R!(Exp(x/(1+x))/Sqrt(1-x^2))); [Factorial(n-1)*b[n]: n in [1..m]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 10 2018
xref: Cf. A111883 (unsigned row sums of A111595).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Aug 23 2005
